body_html: So after reading these, I went ahead and reinstalled, this time from Source following instructions on https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources. I still see the "The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to to use XXXX instructions..." warnings. So did I miss something or is installing from source and building is not what you meant by "building it yourself"?

body: So after reading these, I went ahead and reinstalled, this time from Source following instructions on [https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources). I still see the "The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to to use XXXX instructions..." warnings. So did I miss something or is installing from source and building is not what you meant by "building it yourself"?
